title: Help from admins please
body: I've been having this bug or glitch lately when I start a game, my buttons do anything and I've checked and it said to delete input.ini but it's still happening. Any idea?

replies.body:
To clear your input settings, it must be done in a specific way. I've listed the exact steps below:

>First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:
>**- input.ini**
>-**-PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, leave the match, then hop into another one to confirm the changes went through properly. Let me know if this resolved the issue.
I do that all the time but sometimes that bug comes back
Are you modifying your inputs or making any changes that aren't available in-game? If so, it's likely those changes are causing the problem.
I'm deleting something called lockfile and the Presistedsettings.json

I wouldn't recommend messing with the lockfile, since it can cause certain issues. Other than that, do you make any changes whatsoever to your files after the steps I sent above temporarily resolve the issue?
Not anymore, now I'm just deleting the Presistedsettings.json now and it stopped

Gotcha. Well if the issue comes back, I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Be sure to attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to expedite your ticket.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
